person.persName: Joseph Doniphan (Bracken County circuit judge, state representative, and attorney )

body.p: Born in Augusta, Kentucky, son of local businessman George Doniphan. Began study of law in 1844. Admitted to the bar in 1848. Elected to the Kentucky House of Representatives in 1848, representing Bracken County. Married E.A. Ward in 1856. Served three terms as mayor of Augusta, KY, 1852-1854, 1860-1862, and 1869-1871. Elected circuit judge of the Kentucky Ninth Judicial District Court in 1862. Served a term of six year.
